basics.name: David Laing
basics.label: Staff Software Engineer - AI Reliability Engineering
basics.summary: Reliability engineering leader with 15+ years experience building and scaling distributed systems. Pioneered data reliability practices for 100PB infrastructure at Shopify, maintained platform reliability during $3.5M/minute peak traffic, and established SRE teams from scratch. Currently leading AI agent orchestration initiatives and bringing proven SLI/SLO frameworks to AI infrastructure challenges. Passionate about bringing traditional reliability engineering principles to the unique challenges of large language model systems.

work.position: Staff Software Engineer - AI Context Engineering Lead
work.summary: Leading AI agent orchestration initiatives with focus on reliability and observability. Building cloud infrastructure and establishing reliability practices for AI-assisted development workflows on GCP and AWS.
highlights: Pioneered AI agent orchestration for Kubernetes/Terraform automation - creating reliable environments where AI agents collaborate and self-correct
Established monitoring and observability practices for AI agent reliability and performance optimization
Built and maintained cloud infrastructure on GCP and AWS with focus on high availability and automated failover
Applied traditional reliability engineering principles to novel AI infrastructure challenges
work.name: Mechanical Orchard

work.summary: Established Data Reliability Practice for Shopify's 100PB data warehouse, then transitioned to core SRE maintaining commerce systems for 3 million merchants during peak traffic events.
highlights: Maintained platform reliability during $3.5M/minute peak traffic (BFCM) through data-driven monitoring and automated failover systems
Pioneered data reliability engineering practices for 100PB data lake infrastructure with custom SLI/SLO frameworks
Developed automated monitoring systems for availability and latency metrics across distributed data processing systems
Led incident response for critical data infrastructure serving millions of merchants
Built cost optimization systems balancing performance requirements with infrastructure spend
work.name: Shopify Ltd

work.summary: Built SRE team from scratch and established company-wide reliability practices. Collaborated directly with Google SRE engineers on SLI/SLO design and error budget implementation for Cloud Foundry and Kubernetes platforms.
highlights: Built SRE team from scratch to operate Cloud Foundry and Kubernetes platforms with 99.9%+ availability
Collaborated with Google SRE engineers on SLI/SLO design and error budget implementation
Established reliability practices for pivotaltracker.com (1M active users) including chaos engineering and resilience testing
Led incident response framework and post-mortem processes across 80+ R&D teams globally
Developed high-availability infrastructure with automated failover and recovery systems
Implemented comprehensive observability stack for distributed systems monitoring
work.name: Pivotal

work.summary: Established data engineering practices and built reliable data pipelines for cross-portfolio analytics serving business leadership across VMware's product portfolio.
highlights: Built and maintained highly available dagster.io data pipelines for cross-portfolio analytics
Established telemetry gathering and monitoring systems for data pipeline reliability
Implemented SLO frameworks for data freshness and accuracy metrics
Created automated alerting and recovery systems for critical data processing workflows
work.name: VMWare Ltd

work.summary: Co-founded company to commercialize LogSearch open source project. Built distributed logging infrastructure handling 2TB daily ingest for Cloud Foundry ecosystem.
highlights: Created open-source ELK distribution handling 2TB daily log ingest with 99.9% availability
Implemented high-availability distributed systems architecture for large-scale log processing
Built automated scaling and failover systems for log aggregation infrastructure
work.name: StayUp.io Ltd

education.summary: Majored in Information Systems and Statistics with focus on data-driven decision making and systems reliability.

publications.name: SRE & the Vulnerability Budget
publications.summary: Using Error Budget model to balance security patching with feature development - applying structured decision-making to operational priorities in distributed systems

publications.name: Staying up-to-date with Kubernetes
publications.summary: Explorable model for understanding enterprise software upgrade challenges and long-term maintenance practices for distributed systems reliability

projects.name: AI Agent Reliability Framework
projects.description: Pioneering work in applying traditional SRE principles to AI agent orchestration systems, establishing monitoring, alerting, and recovery patterns for multi-agent environments.
highlights: Developed SLI/SLO frameworks for AI agent performance and collaboration metrics
Built automated monitoring for agent reliability and self-correction capabilities
Established incident response patterns for AI agent infrastructure failures
Created cost optimization strategies for AI infrastructure at scale
